text.div:
Generated Narrative: ValueSet observation-vitalsign-bodytemp

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes fromhttp://loinc.org where COMPONENT = LP65487-8 (Body temperature), PROPERTY = LP6872-8 (Temp), TIME_ASPCT = LP6960-1 (Pt), SYSTEM = LP310005-6 (^Patient) and SCALE_TYP = LP7753-9 (Qn)
  • Include codes fromhttp://loinc.org where COMPONENT = LP433719-4 (Body temperature^at admission), PROPERTY = LP6872-8 (Temp), TIME_ASPCT = LP6960-1 (Pt), SYSTEM = LP310005-6 (^Patient) and SCALE_TYP = LP7753-9 (Qn)

name: VitalSignsBodyTemp
title: Vital Signs - Body Temp
description: This value set defines the set of LOINC codes considered to be appropriate for representing body temperature vital sign measurements in Observation.code.
